class.name: QMeshPolygonNode
class.description: QMeshPolygonNode provides various settings to help you create meshes based on regular polygons. [b]Note:[/b] These helper types of QMeshNode, once added to the scene, are converted into a typical QMeshNode with particles, spring connections, UV mappings, and a polygon. After being added to the scene, all modifications and adjustments should be done using the general methods of QMeshNode, rather than the member properties defined here.

method.name: set_particle_radius
method.description: Sets the radius of particles in the mesh.
